title: Lovely 2 BR upstairs condo in a Gated Community w/ community features!
map_address: 2111 Hussium Hills St. #207 near Rancho and Lake Mead
posting_body: ['Lovely 2 bed/2 bath upstairs condo in a Gated Community on Rancho and Lake Mead!', '888 sq.', 'ft. One covered parking space.', 'Private interior stairway!', 'Front living room.', 'Dining area next to the kitchen.', 'Kitchen has a breakfast bar!', 'Bedrooms are separate from each other!', 'Master bedroom has a walk-in closet.', 'Has a Community Pool, playground, clubhouse, and BBQ areas!', 'No Section 8.', 'All appliances included!', 'Pets allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Please reference the street name 2111 HUSSIUM HILLS ST.', '#207 when calling!', '~First United Management Group, LLC.~', 'Located at Rancho and Lake Mead.', 'License # S.0169212']
